message.name: INFO_DATASTORE_ENTITY_DOES_NOT_CORRESPOND_TO_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: The DataStore entity type '%1s' does not correspond to a rule class in rule set '%2s'.

message.name: INF0_DATASTORE_ATTRIBUTE_DOES_NOT_CORRESPOND_TO_RULE_ATTRIBUTE
message.locale: - skipping - datastore attribute '%1s' does not correspond to an attribute in rule class '%2s'.

message.name: INF0_CREATING_RULE_OBJECT_FROM_DATASTORE_ENTITY
message.locale: Creating a rule object from datastore entity of type '%1s'.

message.name: INF0_CHILD_ATTRIBUTES_RULE_CLASS_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Attribute '%1s' looks like it should be populated with child instances of type '%2s', but there no rule class with name '%2s' could be found.

message.name: INF0_POPULATING_PARENT_ENTITY_VALUE
message.locale: - Populating the value of the 'parentEntity' Attribute

message.name: INF0_PARENTS_CHILD_ENTITIES_VALUE
message.locale: - Adding this rule object to the parent's '%1s' list

message.name: INFO_POPULATING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
message.locale: - Setting value '%1s' on attribute '%2s' of rule class '%3s'.

message.name: ERR_POPULATING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
message.locale: Error setting value '%1s' on attribute '%2s' of rule class '%3s'.
